fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.indoorgarden

Class IndoorGarden

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2022e3.equipments.indoorgarden.IndoorGarden
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI, IndoorGardenImplementationI

    public class IndoorGarden
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
implements IndoorGardenImplementationI
    The class IndoorGarden implements the distant control unit of a small indoor garden which turns a light on during the day to help growing the crops.

    Description

    This component is provided to show a kind of electric equipment that can both be planned and suspended. However, the plan here is a bit different from plans in other equipments like washing machines where a plan can be postponed but then it will still be fully completed at a later time. The indoor garden can postpone the beginning of its plan, but then the plan will be shortened as the end of the plan will remain the same. Also, the plan is meant to ne repeated each day, another difference from a plan for a washing machine.

    The indoor garden is implemented in such a way that when switched on, the light is off. Switching the light on and off is done automatically through the plan defining the time at which it must be switched on and the time at which it must be switched off. Hence, the light will not be operative until a plan is defined.

    As the indoor garden needs an access to the current real time to operate properly, a simulated mode if provided that allows to set the current time arbitrarily.

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       !isSimulated || simArchitectureURI != null && !simArchitectureURI.isEmpty()
 invariant       !isSimulated || accFactor > 0.0
 invariant       !isUnderTest || clockURI != null && !clockURI.isEmpty()

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI != null && !REFLECTION_INBOUND_PORT_URI.isEmpty()
 invariant       INBOUND_PORT_URI_PREFIX != null && !INBOUND_PORT_URI_PREFIX.isEmpty()

    Created on : 2022-09-14

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

        Contract

         pre     !isSimulated || simArchitectureURI != null && !simArchitectureURI.isEmpty()
 pre     !isSimulated || accFactor > 0.0
 pre     !isUnderTest || clockURI != null && !clockURI.isEmpty()
 post    !isOn()
        Parameters:
        isUnderTest - if true, execute the component in test mode.
        isUnitTesting - if true, execute the component in unit testing mode.
        isSimulated - if true, execute the component in SIL simulated mode.
        simArchitectureURI - URI of the simulation architecture to be created or the empty string if the component does not execute as a SIL simulation.
        accFactor - acceleration factor used in timing actions.
        clockURI - URI of the clock to be used to synchronise the test scenarios and the simulation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • movePlanToNextDay
